explains: v. 重新定义，重新界定

sentences.en: We need to redefine what we mean by democracy.
sentences.cn: 我们需要重新考虑我们对民主的理解。

sentences.en: You just have to do a little thinking ahead and redefine what qualifies as dinner.
sentences.cn: 你只需要提前思考一会，并重新定义晚餐应有的标准。

sentences.en: The task facing medicine in the twenty-first century will be to redefine its limits even as it extends its capacities.
sentences.cn: 21世纪医学面临的任务将是重新定义其限制，即使它扩大了其能力。
